name: Paddle
description: Integrate with Paddle to list, list, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Products
tools.description: List products in Paddle. Optionally filter by status or tax category. Returns product names, IDs, and statuses.

tools.name: List Prices
tools.description: List prices in Paddle. Optionally filter by product or status. Returns price amounts, intervals, and IDs.

tools.name: List Subscriptions
tools.description: List subscriptions in Paddle. Optionally filter by status or customer. Returns subscription IDs, statuses, and pricing.

tools.name: List Transactions
tools.description: List transactions in Paddle. Optionally filter by status or subscription. Returns transaction IDs, amounts, and statuses.

tools.name: List Customers
tools.description: List customers in Paddle. Optionally filter by email or status. Returns customer names, emails, and IDs.

sandbox.label: Sandbox Mode
sandbox.description: Use Paddle sandbox environment for testing
